name: Cine Game
description:
Cine Game is a realistic cinematography simulator designed by cinematographer Matt Workman of Cinematography Database. The player uses real world based cameras (tripods, dollies, cranes, and more) and lighting (grip and electric) equipment to photograph and light next gen photo realistic scenes in a virtual environment.

Cine Game Early Release is an Single Player "Open World / Sandbox" experience where players are free create whatever types of scenes, sets, lighting setups they can dream up.

After Early Release, we will be working on online multiplayer Sandbox mode. Single Player campaign and "Fun Modes" like "Cine Destruction" will be tested as well, but are not the priority of Cine Game.
